## Model Assumptions

* $y_{it}$ ~ Poisson($\mu_{it}$) 
* $log(\mu_{it}) = \alpha + \beta X+ \xi_i + \phi_t + \gamma_t + \delta_{it}$
* $\xi_i$ ~ N(0,$D_s(\sigma_s^2, \lambda_s)$)
* $D_s = \sigma_s^2(\lambda_sR_s+(1-\lambda_s)I_s)^{-1}$
* $\xi_i|\xi_{j \neq i}$ ~ $N(\frac{\lambda_s}{1-\lambda_s +\lambda_s m_i}\sum_{i\sim j}\xi_i, \frac{\sigma_s^2}{1-\lambda_s+\lambda_sm_i})$

Note: $\lambda_s$ is a spatial smoothing parameter taking values between 0 and 1. When $\lambda_s$ = 0, the Leroux CAR prior reduced to an exchangeable prior $\xi \sim N(0,\sigma_s^2I_n)$, and when $\lambda_s$ = 1, it is the iCAR model, $\xi \sim N(0,\sigma_s^2R_s^{-})$.
